ai-tha-ap454:2.1_0: This is the meaning of delusion,
ai-tha-ap454:3.1_0: Oh, the Buddhas! Oh, the Dhammas!
ai-tha-ap454:3.2_0: Oh, the accomplishments of the Teacher!
ai-tha-ap454:3.3_0: Having given up delusion, the fool suffers,
ai-tha-ap454:4.1_0: sesame is (true) welfare, and my grandmother.
ai-tha-ap454:4.2_0: rebirth into all states of existence is eradicated,
ai-tha-ap454:4.3_0: With the utter ending of all defilements,
ai-tha-ap454:4.4_0: now there’ll be no more future lives.”
ai-tha-ap454:5.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap454:7.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap454:9.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Mogharāja.
ai-tha-ap454:10.1_0: of the Past of delusion, for the second of the Elders.
